body_text: From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia This article needs additional citations for verification . Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources . Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. Find sources: "VOLI" – news · newspapers · books · scholar · JSTOR ( July 2022 ) ( Learn how and when to remove this message ) Not to be confused with Voli or Voli me, voli . Voli Trade d.o.o. Official logo Company type LLC Industry Retail Founded 1995 ; 29 years ago ( 1995 ) Headquarters Josipa Broza bb, Podgorica , Montenegro Number of locations 64 (2018) Key people Dragan Bokan (CEO, owner) Services Supermarkets , convenience stores , wholesale , BMW & MINI cars dealer Revenue € 207.29 million (2017) Net income €4.26 million (2017) Total assets €136.31 million (2017) Total equity €46.00 million (2017) Number of employees 2,116 (2017) [ 1 ] Website www .volivasvoli .com VOLI (full legal name: Voli Trade d.o.o.) is a Montenegrin retailer, with primary activity in operation of supermarkets . With over 2,000 employees, it is the largest employer in Montenegro . Overview [ edit ] The company was founded in 1995, and begun its operations with a single supermarket in Blok 5 neighbourhood of Podgorica . The company has been expanding its retail network ever since, and as of 2012, its food retail market share in Montenegro stands at around 25%. Its retail network consists of 35 outlets throughout Montenegro, with concepts ranging from convenience stores to a company owned shopping mall, with VOLI hypermarket as anchor tenant . VOLI is also official distributor for Montentegro for several popular regional food brands, such as Carnex , Vital and Vindija . In addition to its retail business, in 2011 VOLI became authorised dealer for BMW and Mini carmakers for Montenegro. Social responsibility [ edit ] In 2011, the company became the general sponsor of KK Budućnost Podgorica , the country's most successful basketball club . The club was renamed KK Budućnost VOLI , and the company's CEO, Dragan Bokan, has become the club's president.
